member.name: T:XWiki.Clients.HTTPResponses
member.summary: Contains response strings from the velocity pages that provide XWord functionality.

member.name: F:XWiki.Clients.HTTPResponses.SAVE_OK
member.summary: Specifies that the saving process was completed successfully.

member.name: F:XWiki.Clients.HTTPResponses.WRONG_REQUEST
member.summary: Appears when a request was in a wrong format or had insufficinet parameters.

member.name: F:XWiki.Clients.HTTPResponses.VELOCITY_PARSER_ERROR
member.summary: Appears when the the server fails to parse a page.

member.name: F:XWiki.Clients.HTTPResponses.INSUFFICIENT_MEMMORY
member.summary: Appears when the server has insufficeinet memmory for the current tasks.

member.name: F:XWiki.Clients.HTTPResponses.NO_PROGRAMMING_RIGHTS
member.summary: Returned if the page requires programming rights but it was las saved by a user without programming rights

member.name: F:XWiki.Clients.HTTPResponses.NO_EDIT_RIGHTS
member.summary: Returned if the current user does not have the right to edit the specified page.

member.name: F:XWiki.Clients.HTTPResponses.NO_GROOVY_RIGHTS
member.summary: Returned when the user/page does not have the right to parse and execute groovy pages.

member.name: P:XWiki.XWikiURLs.ProtectedPagesURL

The struts action.
member.returns: The URL for the specified page and action.
